arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" PLANT_CD, " +" WORK_ODR_CD, " +" PROC_NO, " +" WORK_IN_PROC_CD, " +" PROC_NAME, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE) AS \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(OPR_INST_START_DATE) AS \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" OPR_INST_CD, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(OPR_INST_DATE) AS \\"OPR_INST_DATE\\", " +" OPR_INST_QTY, " +" SUM_ACPT_QTY, " +" SUM_DEFECT_QTY, " +" STOCK_UNIT, " +" WORK_STS_TYP, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(WORK_CMPLT_DATE) AS \\"WORK_CMPLT_DATE\\", " +" ITEM_CD, " +" ITEM_NAME, " +" DRAW_CD, " +" SPEC, " +" MRP_ODR_TYP, " +" JOB_ODR_CD, " +" JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO, " +" OUTSIDE_TYP, " +" WS_CD, " +" WS_NAME, " +" VEND_CD, " +" VEND_ANAME, " +" PUCH_ODR_CD, " +" FncGetFormattedDatetime(OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_DATE) AS \\"OPR_INST_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", " +" ACPT_INSPC_TYP, " +" WORK_STATUS AS \\"STATUS_DN\\" " +"FROM " +" V_WORK_IN_PROC_LST " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND WS_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ? " +" AND ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND OPR_INST_CD = ? " +" AND JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND ((OPR_INST_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND OPR_INST_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" OR (OPR_INST_START_DATE = TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'))) " +" AND ((WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE >= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" OR (WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE = TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'))) " +" AND(WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ?) " +"ORDER BY " +" PLANT_CD, " +" WORK_ODR_CD, " +" PROC_NO, " +" WORK_IN_PROC_CD, " +" PROC_NAME, " +" WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE, " +" OPR_INST_START_DATE"
"select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" M_WS.\\"WS_NAME\\" as \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" M_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WS " +"where " +" M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\" " +"from " +" M_VEND_CTRL " +"where " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP " +"where " +" T_OPR_INST_SLIP.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" count(1) " +"FROM " +" V_WORK_IN_PROC_LST " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND WS_CD = ? " +" AND VEND_CD = ? " +" AND ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND OPR_INST_CD = ? " +" AND JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND((OPR_INST_START_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND OPR_INST_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" OR (OPR_INST_START_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'))) " +" AND((WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" AND WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI')) " +" OR (WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'))) " +" AND(WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ? " +" OR WORK_STATUS = ?) " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
